0.title: ORIGINAL TITLES
clues: Victor Hugo, 1831: "Notre-Dame de Paris"
Lewis Carroll, 1865: "Alice's Adventures Underground"
Jonathan Swift, 1726: "Travels into Several Remote Nations of the World"
Robert Louis Stevenson,1883: "The Sea Cook"
William Faulkner, 1929: "Twilight" (the title ended up 5 words instead of 1)
